author: alex.vlasov
content:
Nice plan!
We have been working on generating tests for fork choice/ePBS too (though w/o LLMs at the moment).
If you are interested we can schedule a zoom to discuss our approaches.

author: not.rithik
content: Awesome! Can you give me this week so I can spend more time studying the current mechanisms in depth? Once I have a solid understanding, I'd love to schedule a call :D
